query: INSERT INTO island_guides (name, slug, atoll, latitude, longitude, description, activities, bestSeason, published) VALUES ('Fuvahmulah Tiger Shark', 'fuvahmulah-tiger-shark', 'Gnaviyani Atoll', 0.2667, 73.3833, 'Thrilling dive site famous for tiger shark encounters. Deep channel dive with strong currents and excellent visibility. Popular among experienced divers seeking pelagic encounters.', 'Diving', 'March to October', 1);
